T11dhkhetuu:159: 00406 yathā yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva,
T11dhkhetuu:162: 00408 siddhiḥ, yathā idam asya upalambha upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:165: 00410 asya abhāve na bhavati iti yas tad-bhāve bhāvas tad-abhāve
T11dhkhetuu:167: 00412 tasya siddhiḥ. kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hy arthāntarasya evaṃ

T11dhkhetuu:170: 00414 eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tat-kāryatvam. anupalabdhāv apy
T11dhkhetuu:179: 00422 abhāva-khyāpanaṃ apratibandha-mātra-siddhau sidhyati iti na tatra

T11dhkhetuu:186: 00507 ity atra eva trividhe avinābhāva-niyamāt. pakṣa-dharmasya
T11dhkhetuu:189: 00509 anyatra na asti ity atra eva niyata ucyate.
T11dhkhetuu:195: 00515 dharmaṃ svabhāvam icchanti. viśeṣaṇena tathāvidhasya atat-
T11dhkhetuu:196: 00516 svabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetor vyabhicāraṃ ca āha, yathā
T11dhkhetuu:200: 00519 yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ saṃś
T11dhkhetuu:205: 00523 atra sāmarthyād eva pratijñā-arthasya pratīter na pratijñāyāḥ
T11dhkhetuu:206: 00524 prayogaḥ. apradarśite prameye arthe kathaṃ tat-pratītir iti cet.
T11dhkhetuu:207: 00601 svayaṃ pratipattau prameyasya ka upadarśayitā. pradeśa-sthaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:208: 00602 dhūmam upalabdhavatas tasya agninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tat-sāmarthyād
T11dhkhetuu:209: 00603 eva agnir atra iti pratītir bhavati. na ca tatra kaścid
T11dhkhetuu:210: 00604 agnir atra ity asmai nivedayati. na api prāg eva pratipadyate
T11dhkhetuu:211: 00605 kiṃcit, pramāṇam antareṇa evaṃ pratīter nimitta-abhāvāt.
T11dhkhetuu:212: 00606 pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyaṃ. svayam eva akasmād
T11dhkhetuu:213: 00607 agnir atra iti prameyaṃ vyavasthāpya paścāt tat-pratipattaye
T11dhkhetuu:214: 00608 liṅgam anusarati iti ko ayaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ. pareṇa api
T11dhkhetuu:218: tena eva tāvad darśitena ko arthaḥ. yadi
T11dhkhetuu:221: 00612 pratītau vinā api kenacid viṣaya-upasthāpakena pratiyan asmān
T11dhkhetuu:222: 00613 kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate.
T11dhkhetuu:223: 00614 asmad-vacanād api svayaṃ siddham eva liṅgam anusṛtya
T11dhkhetuu:224: 00615 pratyeti iti ko anayor avasthayor viśeṣaḥ. dṛṣṭā ca pakṣa-dharma-
T11dhkhetuu:226: 00617 iti kas tasya upayogaḥ. sva-niścaya-vad anyeṣām api niścaya-utpādanāya
T11dhkhetuu:229: 00619 antareṇa api pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayan apūrvam

T11dhkhetuu:237: 00625 nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā pratītiḥ syān na vā. bhāve
T11dhkhetuu:245: 00706 dharma-bhede tathā api tad-bhāvasya eva khyāpanāt. na hy
T11dhkhetuu:246: 00707 atat-svabhāvasya bhāva ekāntena anyabhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve
T11dhkhetuu:249: 00709 tasya nivṛttir yathā anayor eva dharmayor nivṛttiḥ. tasmād
T11dhkhetuu:250: 00710 anvaya-vyatirekayor yathā-lakṣaṇam eko api prayukto dvitīyam
T11dhkhetuu:251: 00711 ākṣipati iti na ekatra sādhana-vākye dvayoḥ prayoga iṣyate,
T11dhkhetuu:254: 00713 tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau ca anvayasya api siddheḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:255: 00714 tad-abhāva eva abhāva-khyātir yathā syān na anyatra viruddhe
T11dhkhetuu:256: 00715 vā iti niyama-khyāpana-artho api vyatireka-prayogo na yuktaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:258: 00717 katham idam avagamyate sad avaśyaṃ naśvara-svabhāvam iti
T11dhkhetuu:266: 00721 eva karoti, tasya nivṛtteḥ. na api bhāva-antaram eva,
T11dhkhetuu:267: 00722 bhāva-antara-karaṇe bhāve tad-avasthe na kiṃcit karoti iti tathā-upalabdhy-
T11dhkhetuu:268: 00801 ādi-prasaṅgaḥ. na api bhāva-antaram asya āvaraṇam,
T11dhkhetuu:270: 00802 tasminn āvaraṇasya apy ayogāt. na api vināśa-hetunā bhāva-abhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:274: evaṃ ca akartur ahetutvam iti na vināśa-hetuḥ
T11dhkhetuu:276: 00807 vaiyarthyāc ca. yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmany anavasthāyī-
T11dhkhetuu:279: 00809 eva svayaṃ nāśāt. yo hi yat svabhāvaḥ sa sva-hetor
T11dhkhetuu:285: 00814 tadvad asthiti-dharmā cet svabhāvato niṣpanno na punas
T11dhkhetuu:290: 00818 janayanti, tadvad bhāvo api vināśe syād iti. na tat-svabhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:291: 00819 jananād ajanakasya ca atat-svabhāvatvāt. ata eva
T11dhkhetuu:294: 00821 anyathātva-abhāvāt tat-svabhāvasya paścād iva prāg api
T11dhkhetuu:295: 00822 janana-prasaṅgāt. tasmād yo antyo avasthā-viśeṣaḥ sa eva aṅkura-ādi-
T11dhkhetuu:300: 00904 te antyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti iti, janayanty
T11dhkhetuu:301: 00905 eva, na atra anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvasya avaiparītyāt. teṣu sarveṣu
T11dhkhetuu:302: 00906 sahakāriṣu samartha-svabhāveṣu ko aparasya upayoga iti cet, na vai
T11dhkhetuu:303: 00907 bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣā-pūrva-kāritā yato ayam eko api samarthaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:304: 00908 kim asmābhir ity apare nivarteran. nirabhiprāya-vyāpārā
T11dhkhetuu:306: 00910 na upālambham arhanti. samarthāḥ kiṃ na aparāparaṃ janayanti
T11dhkhetuu:307: 00911 iti cet, na, tatra eva sāmarthyāt. tasya eva ekasya janane
T11dhkhetuu:308: 00912 samarthā na anyasya iti na aparāpara-jananam.
T11dhkhetuu:310: 00914 kārya-utpattau na kāraṇa-bhedāt kārya-bhedaḥ syād iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:315: 00918 vṛkṣa-ādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāt tasya eva mṛd-ātmanaḥ

T11dhkhetuu:318: 00921 bhavati; tad evaṃ na kulālān mṛt-svabhāvatā, na
T11dhkhetuu:326: 01006 svabhāvaḥ kulāla-mṛt-piṇḍayor upayoga-viṣaya iti cet, uktam
T11dhkhetuu:327: 01007 atra. api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:329: 01008 na pṛthak karoti. guṇasya dravya-paratantratvam iti na pṛthak
T11dhkhetuu:330: 01009 karoti. tat-saṃsthāna-ādhāra-ātmakaṃ yadi svabhāvena tad dravyaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:334: 01012 vastuna eva yogyatā dharmatā iti prāg api mṛt-piṇḍasya saṃsthāna-
T11dhkhetuu:336: 01014 prasaṅgaḥ. evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛd-dravyasya kulālād
T11dhkhetuu:339: 01016 asti tāvad eka-svabhāvatve api kasyacid aneka-pratyaya-upadheya-
T11dhkhetuu:342: 01019 tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā na eka-upayoga-viṣayāḥ kārya-
T11dhkhetuu:343: 01020 svabhāvasya ekatve api vastuta iti yathā iha kāraṇa-bhedo bhinna-
T11dhkhetuu:344: 01021 viśeṣa-upayogān na eka-kāryas tathā cakṣur-ādibhyo vijñāna-utpattāv
T11dhkhetuu:348: 01103 tat tulya-rūpatā ity abhinnatve api vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ
T11dhkhetuu:349: 01104 bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavanti iti na
T11dhkhetuu:350: 01105 kāraṇa-bhede apy abhedas tat-kārya-viśeṣasya. ta eva ete kāraṇa-
T11dhkhetuu:353: 01108 sthity-āśraya ity ucyante. tathā hi tat tebhyaḥ samastebhya
T11dhkhetuu:355: 01110 rūpaṃ ca iti prativiśiṣṭa-svabhāvam ekaṃ jātam.
T11dhkhetuu:357: 01112 pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakāra-artha iti cet, na vai
T11dhkhetuu:358: 01113 sarvatra atiśaya-utpādanaṃ sahakriyā. kiṃ tarhi. bahūnāṃ yad
T11dhkhetuu:363: 01116 kāraṇatvāt tatra ca kṣaṇa ekasya svabhāvasya avivekād viśeṣasya
T11dhkhetuu:366: 01118 utpatteḥ. bhāva-antara-utpattāv antyaṃ na syāt, tataś ca na
T11dhkhetuu:367: 01119 sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ syāt. tasmān na kāraṇasya sahakāribhyo viśeṣa-
T11dhkhetuu:368: 01120 utpattiḥ. te samarthāḥ svabhāvato antyāḥ pratyayāḥ
T11dhkhetuu:369: 01121 saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prāg-paścāt-pṛthag-bhāvo na asti
T11dhkhetuu:377: tataś ca eko api kvacid janayed iti
T11dhkhetuu:379: 01205 saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ
T11dhkhetuu:381: tathā api bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ;
T11dhkhetuu:384: 01208 tatra yo avyavadhāna-ādi-deśo rūpa-indriya-ādi-kalāpaḥ sa vijñāna-
T11dhkhetuu:385: 01209 janane samartho hetuḥ. yas teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-
T11dhkhetuu:387: 01211 teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścān na pṛthag bhāva iti samarthān
T11dhkhetuu:388: 01212 api pūrva-apara-pṛthag-bhāva-bhāvino doṣā na upalīyante. tena yas
T11dhkhetuu:389: 01213 teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-ādi-hetuḥ sa samarthasya hetur iti tatra
T11dhkhetuu:390: 01214 na kadācid anyathābhāvaḥ. anena nyāyena sarvatra hetu-phala-
T11dhkhetuu:396: 01219 anya-sahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:398: 01220 janane samarthaḥ svabhāvo asamartho vā samartha iti cet, kiṃ
T11dhkhetuu:399: 01221 na karoti, akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ. kuvinda-ādayaḥ paṭa-ādi-
T11dhkhetuu:400: 01222 kriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvadā kurvanti iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:403: 01301 mūrkhaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtam api punaḥ punaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:404: 01302 kārayati, tathā hy etad bīja-ādy-upanyāse nirloṭhitam. tasmāt
T11dhkhetuu:412: 01308 api ca sa eva tāvat sakala-sahakāri-sahitaḥ kāryaṃ kasmāt
T11dhkhetuu:414: tena karoti iti brūmaḥ. aho mahā-sāmarthyaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:417: 01312 kadācit kiṃcit kathaṃcit atra-bhavanto darśana-patham atikrāmet,
T11dhkhetuu:419: 01314 cintā cittaṃ dunoti. na vai vayam atat-svabhāvānām asmad-darśana-
T11dhkhetuu:420: 01315 vaśāt kārya-kriyāṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. svabhāvena eva te
T11dhkhetuu:422: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe ta ete
T11dhkhetuu:426: 01318 dharmā, tena samasta-pratyayavatām akṛtvā na upekṣā āpattir iti.
T11dhkhetuu:427: 01319 so akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadā eva antya-
T11dhkhetuu:428: 01320 avasthāyām utpanna āhosvit prāg apy āsīt. āsīt,
T11dhkhetuu:431: 01401 virodhāt. tat kim idānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca; ko vā asya
T11dhkhetuu:432: 01402 bhāṣitasya artho akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā ca svabhāvo na ca karoti iti.
T11dhkhetuu:433: 01403 sahitas tat-svabhāvo na kevala iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:437: 01405 na hi sa sāhitye api pararūpeṇa kartā;
T11dhkhetuu:439: 01406 api tad eva iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyā-virāmaḥ. yasya api bhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:440: 01407 kṣaṇikas tasya api kasmāt kevalo na karoti,
T11dhkhetuu:442: 01408 kathaṃ na bhavati. kṣaṇikatvāt. uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā. sa katham
T11dhkhetuu:443: 01409 eka-kṣaṇa-bhāvy anyathā bhavet. yaś ca bhavati, sa eva na
T11dhkhetuu:447: 01412 yo api manyate akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā eva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:450: 01414 iti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti, tasya api
T11dhkhetuu:451: 01415 kathaṃ sa kevalo api karoty eva kāryaṃ ca tasmān na utpadyate
T11dhkhetuu:452: 01416 iti tad-avastho virodhaḥ. na kevalaḥ karoty eva iti cet, katham
T11dhkhetuu:453: 01417 idānīm akṣepa-kriyā-svabhāvaḥ. nanv etad eva paridīpitaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:455: kāryaṃ ca ayaṃ kevalo api samarthaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:456: 01419 san param apekṣamānaṃ katham upekṣeta. param anādṛtya etad
T11dhkhetuu:458: evaṃ hy anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:459: 01421 bhavati. kāryaṃ param apekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattir
T11dhkhetuu:461: sa kevalo api samartha-svabhāva iti tata utpattiṃ
T11dhkhetuu:462: 01502 brūṣe, ete ca ekatra kathaṃ syātām. tad ayam īrśyā-śalya-vitudyamāna-
T11dhkhetuu:463: 01503 marmā viklavaṃ vikrośati ity upekṣām arhati.
T11dhkhetuu:468: 01507 yatra tu santāna-upakāreṇa bhāvā hetutāṃ pratipadyante
T11dhkhetuu:476: na hi taṇḍula-ādīnāṃ dahana-ādau krameṇa svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:480: 01515 akṣepa-kāriṣu tv indriya-ādiṣu na viśeṣa-utpattiḥ parasparataḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:484: 01518 hetutāṃ pratipadyanta iti tatra eka-arthakriyā eva sahakāritvam.
T11dhkhetuu:485: 01519 yatra viśeṣa-utpādanena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayās tatra hetu-
T11dhkhetuu:486: 01520 santānaḥ pratyayān apekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāva-antara-pratilambha-
T11dhkhetuu:488: 01522 tebhya eva viśiṣṭa-kṣaṇa-utpādāt krameṇa yāvad atiśayavato
T11dhkhetuu:491: 01602 eva utpattir na yuktā. aviśiṣṭād viśeṣa-utpattau kāryasya api
T11dhkhetuu:492: 01603 syāt; paraspara-viśeṣa-utpādān apekṣiṇo api sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:493: 01604 kurvīran. tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāry-anapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatā
T11dhkhetuu:494: 01605 syāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāva-atiśaya-utpattiś ca na syāt. atha
T11dhkhetuu:495: 01606 sahakāriṇā kṛta-viśeṣa eva viśeṣa-utpādāv apy upatiṣṭheta; evam
T11dhkhetuu:496: 01607 anavasthā syāt. na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara-kārya-utpāda-anuguṇa
T11dhkhetuu:497: 01608 viśeṣa-utpādane nityaṃ yogya-avasthā yena eṣāṃ paraspara-
T11dhkhetuu:500: 01610 viraha-darśanāt. tena ādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya
T11dhkhetuu:502: na asmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacane kaścid
T11dhkhetuu:504: yady evam api lokasya nyāya-pratītir bhavati,
T11dhkhetuu:505: 01613 hanta tarhy ucyatām. na viśeṣa-utpādanād eva sahakāriṇāṃ
T11dhkhetuu:506: 01614 sahakāritvāṃ yatas tad-abhāvād viśeṣa-janane sahakāriṇo na
T11dhkhetuu:507: 01615 syuḥ. kiṃ tarhi. eka-arthakriyāyā api. sa api bhavet parasparato
T11dhkhetuu:511: 01617 viśeṣa-bhāvi kāryam api kevalād bhavet iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:513: 01618 aparāparaiḥ pratyayair yathā bhāva-santāne viśeṣa-utpattir yogya-
T11dhkhetuu:514: 01619 deśatā-ādy-avasthā-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca kārya-karaṇaṃ teṣāṃ ca yata
T11dhkhetuu:515: 01620 utpattiḥ pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye api yathā kevalānām akriyā-
T11dhkhetuu:519: 01704 bhedād iti sarvam uktam. tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santāna-upakāra-
T11dhkhetuu:525: 01708 na anavasthā. tathā yady akṣaṇiko api bhāva ādya-viśeṣa-kāraṇa-vad
T11dhkhetuu:531: 01711 api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.
T11dhkhetuu:532: 01712 tasmād akṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ na eka-arthakriyayā kaścit
T11dhkhetuu:533: 01713 sahakāritva-niyamo na api santāna-upakāreṇa iti na tasya kaścit sahakārī;
T11dhkhetuu:534: 01714 tasmāt kevalo api kuryāt. prāyas tu saṃghāta-sthāyī bhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:539: 01718 ucyate. kārakasya svabhāvasya prāg api bhāvo akriyā na yujyate.
T11dhkhetuu:540: 01801 tasmād yo yad-ātmā sa sattā-mātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati;
T11dhkhetuu:541: 01802 na bhūtvā tad-bhāve para-abhisaṃskāram apekṣate. svabhāvato
T11dhkhetuu:546: 01805 kartum aśakyatvāt. anyathātva-pratipattau vā tat-svabhāva eva
T11dhkhetuu:547: 01806 na syād iti pūrva eva vikalpaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:548: tatra ca uktam. yaś ca parasmād
T11dhkhetuu:549: 01807 anyathābhāvaḥ so aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaś ca aparaḥ sa kathaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:550: 01808 tasya, svabhāva-bheda-lakṣaṇatvād bhāva-bhedasya. tathā ca pūrvako
T11dhkhetuu:551: 01809 bhāvo acyuti-dharme sthita iti na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:553: 01811 svabhāva-antara-utpattiḥ pratyuktā. tatra api pūrvakasya sva-rasa-nirodhitvād
T11dhkhetuu:554: 01812 vināśe agny-āder upādānāc ca apara eva drava-ādi-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:559: na ca vināśo nāma aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:562: 01817 dvayam atikrāmati. kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ svabhāvena āhosvid anityo iti
T11dhkhetuu:563: 01818 vikalpe prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo bhavati iti bruvāṇaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:565: 01820 bhāva-dvayaṃ ca svayaṃ ca nāśam anāśaṃ ca prāha iti
T11dhkhetuu:566: 01821 pūrvasmin vināśa-hetur asamarthaḥ. na prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād
T11dhkhetuu:567: 01822 anityo bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. paścād api nityo eva,
T11dhkhetuu:569: 01823 sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam anāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo
T11dhkhetuu:571: 01902 tasmāt saty asya vināśe vināśa-svabhāvena anena bhavitavyam.
T11dhkhetuu:572: 01903 tathā api vyartho vināśa-hetur ity uktam. tena svabhāvato
T11dhkhetuu:573: 01904 naśvare anaśvare vā bhāve na vināśa-hetor upayogaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:574: 01905 tasmād vināśe anapekṣo bhāvas tad-bhāva-niyata iti yaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:578: 01908 svabhāvato naśvaratve api kaścid atat-svabhāvo api syāt, na
T11dhkhetuu:579: 01909 hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na anvaya-vyatireka-siddhir iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:580: 01910 na, akṣaṇikatve avastutva-prasaṅgāt. śaktir hi bhāva-lakṣaṇam,
T11dhkhetuu:581: 01911 sarva-śakti-viraho abhāva-lakṣaṇam. na ca akṣaṇya kvacit kācic
T11dhkhetuu:583: 01913 sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti vyāpti-siddhiḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:589: 01918 kāryaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir avinābhāvi kāraṇe, teṣāṃ
T11dhkhetuu:591: tair eva ca dharmair ye tair
T11dhkhetuu:592: 01920 vinā na bhavanti. aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet, na,
T11dhkhetuu:595: 02002 kasyacit kadācit kutaścit bhāve api sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidha-
T11dhkhetuu:596: 02003 janmā iti kuto avasitam. tathā ca na anvaya-vyatirekāv iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:597: 02004 na, atad-bhāvinas tasya sakṛd api tato abhāvāt. paraspara-apekṣayā
T11dhkhetuu:601: 02007 svabhāvo na bhavati iti sakṛd api tato na bhaved arthāntara-vat,
T11dhkhetuu:604: 02009 vat. na ca dhūmasya tad-ataj-janya-svabhāvo yuktaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:611: 02014 viśeṣa-janitaḥ so dhūma iti kārya-kāraṇayor evaṃ svabhāva-niyamāt
T11dhkhetuu:612: 02015 tad vijātīyād utpattir na bhavati. tat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:613: 02016 na vyabhicarati. tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya
T11dhkhetuu:615: 02018 nanu vijātīyād api kiṃcid bhavad dṛṣṭam, tad yathā
T11dhkhetuu:616: 02019 gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
T11dhkhetuu:617: 02020 eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena
T11dhkhetuu:618: 02101 vṛttau tu śarād bhavati. asti ca gomaya-itara-janman-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:623: 02104 jāti-bheda-darśanāt. anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā
T11dhkhetuu:625: 02106 abhedāv ity ahetukau viśvasya bheda-abhedau syātām. tathā
T11dhkhetuu:626: 02107 hi na bhedād bheda ity abhedād api na abhedaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:628: 02108 ca na kaścid bhāva-svabhāva ity ahetukatvād bhāvānāṃ nityaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:631: 02110 bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti vyavasthāvāṃś ca sādhyeṣu
T11dhkhetuu:632: 02111 sādhana-niyogo na syāt. kāraṇa-śakti-pratiniyame hi kiṃcid eva
T11dhkhetuu:638: 02114 taj-janana-svabhāva-vilakṣaṇād api tasya utpattau na taj-janana-
T11dhkhetuu:640: 02116 śakti-sāmye tu tad eva iti na kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.
T11dhkhetuu:650: 02202 yogyatā eva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat. yatra yasminn upalabhyamāne
T11dhkhetuu:651: 02203 niyamena yasya upalabdhir bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt,
T11dhkhetuu:656: 02206 eka-jñāna-saṃsargiṇoḥ paraspara-apekṣam eva anyatvam iha abhipretam,
T11dhkhetuu:658: 02208 tad-anya iti taj-jñānaṃ tat-svabhāvo vā jñātṛ-jñeya-dharma-
T11dhkhetuu:665: 02213 vṛttyā apekṣāto abhāvo anupalabdhiś ca anupalabdhiḥ. na pratiṣedha-
T11dhkhetuu:667: 02215 prasaṅgāt. tasya asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya bhāva-siddhir eva aparasya abhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:668: 02216 siddhir ity anyabhāvo api tad-abhāva iti vyapadeśyate.
T11dhkhetuu:670: 02218 vyavahāraṃ sādhayet tat-siddhi-siddho vā tad-abhāva iti
T11dhkhetuu:673: 02301 syāt. sa eva anyabhāvas tad-viṣayā ca upalabdhis tad-abhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:681: 02306 agni-vat. anyabhāva-siddhyā eva tad-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya
T11dhkhetuu:684: 02309 sambandha-abhāvāc ca. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya
T11dhkhetuu:687: 02311 samavāyo dhūmasya liṅginaś ca eka-artha-samavāyo vā ādhārādheyabhāvo
T11dhkhetuu:688: 02312 vā janyajanakabhāvo vā. na evaṃ kaścid bhāva-abhāvayoḥ
T11dhkhetuu:691: 02314 asti viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ śabda-artha-sambandha-vad iti cet, śabda-
T11dhkhetuu:692: 02315 arthayos tat-pratipādana-abhiprāye sati tat-prayogāt tena saha
T11dhkhetuu:694: 02317 ayaṃ ca atra na sambhavati iti kathaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:695: 02318 siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tan-mukhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:696: 02319 syāt; sa eva asati sambandhe na sidhyati;
T11dhkhetuu:698: 02320 viṣayaviṣayibhāvo api na. anyathā itaretara-āśrayam idaṃ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:699: 02321 anyabhāvāc ca abhāva-siddhāv asamudāyaś ca sādhyaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:700: 02322 syāt. tathā ca ghaṭa-abhāvas tad-anyabhāvād iti ghaṭasya sarvatra
T11dhkhetuu:703: 02401 cet; pradeśa-ādi-dharmi-viśeṣaṇa-bhūto abhāvaḥ sādhyate, na tu
T11dhkhetuu:704: 02402 kevalaḥ; tato na asamudāyasya sādhyatā. na ca liṅga-liṅginor
T11dhkhetuu:707: pradeśa-āder eva anyabhāvatvāt. yatra eva hi
T11dhkhetuu:708: 02405 pradeśe yan na asti ity ucyate sa eva tena asaṃsṛṣṭo anyabhāvaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:709: 02406 tad-darśanād eva asya ghaṭo na asti iti vikalpa iti kathaṃ tasya eva
T11dhkhetuu:711: 02408 na ca atra sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāva-kalpanā sambhavati, yena
T11dhkhetuu:712: 02409 sāmānyaṃ hetur bhavet viśeṣo dharmī iti,
T11dhkhetuu:714: 02410 tad-abhāvasya pratītes tasya ca anyatra anya-abhāvāt. pratijñārthaikadeśatvāc
T11dhkhetuu:715: 02411 ca na hetutvam. na ca yatra pradeśa-mātraṃ
T11dhkhetuu:716: 02412 tatra ghaṭa-abhāvaḥ. tādṛśe kevale pradeśe abhāva eva iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:717: 02413 nanu tasya eva kevala iti ghaṭa-viraha iti. sa ca liṅgabhūta-
T11dhkhetuu:718: 02414 pradeśa-pratipattāv eva siddhaḥ. kasya idānīṃ tal liṅgam. anvayasya
T11dhkhetuu:719: 02415 anugamanaṃ ca nirarthakam. tasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam
T11dhkhetuu:725: 02419 kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭo,
T11dhkhetuu:727: 02420 sambandhaḥ syāt. abhāvas tu pratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena aviruddhaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:729: 02422 virodhaḥ. tasmāt sambandha-abhāvaḥ. atra apy asamudāya-sādhyatvaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:732: 02425 gatyā api tad-abhāva-gatir na syād iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:739: 02504 tasya kaivalyam aparasya vaikalyam iti tad-anyabhāva
T11dhkhetuu:742: 02506 iti. anyathā tasya paricchedena tato anyasya avyavacchede
T11dhkhetuu:745: 02508 vyavahāraḥ kasyacid darśanāt kvacit prāpti-parihāra-arthaḥ, sa
T11dhkhetuu:746: 02509 na syāt. na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann api kevalam analam
T11dhkhetuu:755: 02514 pratipattiḥ. tasya tato vā anyasya kasyacid apy apratipattāv
T11dhkhetuu:757: 02516 pṛṣṭhībhava-ādy-avasthāsv apy abhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate. bhūyo api
T11dhkhetuu:758: 02517 vicāritaṃ pramāṇaviniścaye. tasmād ayam analaṃ paśyann apy
T11dhkhetuu:759: 02518 analo ayaṃ na salilam ity anadhyavasyan na tiṣṭhen na api
T11dhkhetuu:760: 02519 pratiṣṭheta iti dustaraṃ vyasanaṃ pratipannaḥ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:761: 02520 tata eva ekasya darśanād anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:762: 02521 katham ekaṃ dṛṣṭam anyan na asti iti pratyāyayati. kevalasya
T11dhkhetuu:766: 02602 paruṣam iva ābhāti. tasmāt tīra-adarśinā eva śakuninā paryaṭā
T11dhkhetuu:767: 02603 api pratyāgantavyam ity alam avidyamāna-pratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:769: 02605 yady eka-paricchedād eva anya-vyavacchedaḥ sidhyati, sarvasya
T11dhkhetuu:778: 02611 tad-anyasya ātmā bhavati. anya-ātmano avyavacchede pravṛtti-
T11dhkhetuu:779: 02612 nivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. taṃ ca deśa-kāla-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:781: 02614 pracyutim asya vyavacchinatti. evaṃ hi sa tayā paricchinno
T11dhkhetuu:782: 02615 yady anyathābhāvo vyavacchinno bhavati tathātvaṃ ca
T11dhkhetuu:783: 02616 tasya eva bhavati na anyasya ity anyathābhūtād vyavacchindaty
T11dhkhetuu:784: 02617 eva tat paricchinatti. evam ekasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ sarva-
T11dhkhetuu:792: 02623 tasmāt kvacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ tat paricchinatti
T11dhkhetuu:794: 02701 sūcayati iti eka-pramāṇa-vyāpāra eṣaḥ. tathā hi kvacit pramāṇaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:798: 02704 tatra aparicchedāt. atas tad eva pramāṇaṃ prakāra-antara-abhāvaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:799: 02705 sādhayati, tasmin dṛśyamāne adṛṣṭasya tad-anyatvena sarvasya
T11dhkhetuu:800: 02706 vyavasthāpanād atad-anyasya eva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt.
T11dhkhetuu:802: 02709 tad evaṃ ekasya upalambhāt tasya tad-anya-ātmano vyavacchedaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:803: 02710 na tad-deśa-kālayoḥ sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya vyavacchedaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:804: 02711 tasmād atadātmā ca syāt tad-deśa-kālaś ca,
T11dhkhetuu:806: 02712 vat. tasmād yathoktād eva anupalambhāt kvacit kadācit
T11dhkhetuu:808: 02714 anyabhāva-viṣaya-upalabdhir api tad-abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva,
T11dhkhetuu:812: 02717 siddheḥ. na hy anyabhāvaṃ pratipadya tat-pratipatter anvaya-
T11dhkhetuu:813: 02718 vyatirekau prasādhya tad-abhāvaṃ pratipadyate. kiṃ tarhi.
T11dhkhetuu:815: 02720 darśana-anantaraṃ vyavadhānena vinā idam asti idaṃ tu na asti iti
T11dhkhetuu:817: dṛṣṭānta-asiddheḥ. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yad
T11dhkhetuu:818: 02722 yasya anvayi vyatireki ca. na hy evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anya-
T11dhkhetuu:821: 02724 abhāvāt. sāmānyena pradarśane dṛṣṭānte api pramāṇa-antara-abhāvāt
T11dhkhetuu:822: 02725 sā eva tad-anyabhāva-upalabdhiḥ sādhya-dharmasya sādhikā iti
T11dhkhetuu:824: 02801 tasmān na kutaścil liṅgād abhāva-siddhiḥ. so anyabhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:827: 02804 sā iyaṃ tridhā anupalabdhiḥ. siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve
T11dhkhetuu:831: 02808 anyabhāva-siddher eva. sa tatra asiddhaḥ kārya-vyāpyayor abhāvam
T11dhkhetuu:832: 02809 abhāva-vyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati. svabhāva-anupalabdhau tv anupalabdhyā
T11dhkhetuu:836: 02813 ca sādhayataḥ sā ca anupalabdhis tayor upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
T11dhkhetuu:839: 02815 arthe prayogaḥ. na eva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā,
T11dhkhetuu:842: 02817 parasya avaśyam abhāva-niścaya iti darśana-artham ete prayujyete.
T11dhkhetuu:843: 02818 ity eṣa pakṣa-dharmo anvaya-vyatirekavān iti tad-aṃśena
T11dhkhetuu:844: 02819 vyāptas tri-lakṣaṇas trirūpa eva hetur gamakaḥ, sva-sādhya-
T11dhkhetuu:846: 02821 ṣaḍ-lakṣaṇo hetur ity apare. trīṇi ca etāny abādhita-viṣayatvam
T11dhkhetuu:848: 02902 tatra abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
T11dhkhetuu:849: 02903 bādha-avinābhāvayor virodhāt. avinābhāvo hi saty eva sādhya-
T11dhkhetuu:850: 02904 dharme bhāvo hetoḥ. sa hetus tal-lakṣaṇo dharmiṇi syāt, atra
T11dhkhetuu:851: 02905 ca sādhya-dharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet. pratyakṣa-anumāne hi
T11dhkhetuu:853: 02907 tasmin saty eva hetur bhavaṃs taṃ tatra eva dharmiṇy avasthāpayati
T11dhkhetuu:854: 02908 iti paraṃ bata bhāvānām asvāsthyam. anyatra
T11dhkhetuu:855: 02909 sādhya-dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetur na dharmiṇy eva iti cet, tat
T11dhkhetuu:856: 02910 kim ayaṃ tapasvī ṣaṇḍham udvāhya putraṃ mṛgyate. yasya
T11dhkhetuu:857: 02911 dharmiṇy asaty api sādhya-dharme bhāvas tam upadarśya
T11dhkhetuu:858: 02912 kathaṃ sa dharmī sādhya-dharmavān ity ucyate. ata eva bādhā
T11dhkhetuu:860: yata eva hetur anyathā api bhavet, ata
T11dhkhetuu:861: 02914 eva pramāṇābhyām abādhita-dharmā dharmī ity ucyate iti tat
T11dhkhetuu:862: 02915 kim idānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam abādhayā eva sādhya-siddheḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:867: 02918 abhāvāt. aniyame na ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhya-abhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:868: 02919 ca sambhava iti na sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:869: 02920 na bādhāyā abhāvo abādhā. kiṃ tarhi. bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:870: 02921 sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādha-asambhave api syād iti sa
T11dhkhetuu:871: 02922 hetu-prayogasya viṣayaḥ. kiṃ nu vai hetur bādha-upalabdher api
T11dhkhetuu:874: 02924 prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ. sa tarhi hetuḥ paramārthena
T11dhkhetuu:875: 03001 bādhā kim asti na asti ity anapekṣya bādhā-anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:876: 03002 kim arthaṃ prayujyate. sādhya-siddhy-artham. sa kiṃ
T11dhkhetuu:877: 03003 kvacit satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayet,
T11dhkhetuu:879: 03004 niścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuś ca prayujyate. tathā
T11dhkhetuu:880: 03005 ca abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāyām
T11dhkhetuu:888: 03010 na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ sāmarthyam iti cet, yady evaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:890: 03012 prayogaṃ na arhati. bādhā-anupalambhe sāmarthyam iti cet, kim
T11dhkhetuu:893: 03014 kṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet. atha tan-nivṛttau bādhā
T11dhkhetuu:894: 03015 nivartate, tathā api bādhā-anupalambhād eva sādhya-siddher vyartho
T11dhkhetuu:895: 03016 hetuḥ, anupalambhe bādhāyā asambhavāt. upalambhasya nivṛttāv
T11dhkhetuu:896: 03017 api bādhāyā anivṛttau tad-avasthaṃ hetor asāmarthyam
T11dhkhetuu:897: 03018 ity aprayogaḥ. tasmāt sva-sādhya-bhāva-abhāvābhyām anyathā api
T11dhkhetuu:898: 03019 bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiṃcin na bhāvayati na vibhāvayati ity
T11dhkhetuu:899: 03020 upakṣepo na samarthaḥ. tan na bādhā-avinābhāvau sahāvasthitau;
T11dhkhetuu:902: 03023 vā bhavet, yasya bhāve api yasya anyasya abhāvaḥ. tad yathā
T11dhkhetuu:903: 03024 pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti. na ca etad bādhāyā avinābhāve
T11dhkhetuu:904: 03101 sati sambhavati iti na sādhya-viparyaya-avibhāvinor hetu-viruddhayor
T11dhkhetuu:905: 03102 viṣaye bādhā sambhavati iti na tad-abhāvaḥ pṛthag
T11dhkhetuu:906: 03103 anayor lakṣaṇa-antaratvena vācyaḥ. tasmād hetoḥ prayoge
T11dhkhetuu:907: 03104 pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ sambhavo na asti. na api kevalā pratijñā
T11dhkhetuu:909: 03106 etena eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā api pratyuktā. katham. eko hi sva-
T11dhkhetuu:910: 03107 sādhya-bhāva eva bhāvāt tad-avyabhicārī. tatra eva tasmād anyas
T11dhkhetuu:911: 03108 tad-bādhakasya eva bhāvāt tad-viruddha ity atra bādhayā
T11dhkhetuu:913: 03110 api ca kiṃ vastuto asambhavat-pratihetuḥ sa samyag-jñāna-
T11dhkhetuu:914: 03111 viparyaya-hetur āhosvid apradarśita-pratihetuḥ kiṃ ca ataḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:917: 03113 etat. hetv-abhāvo vā. na hy aniścita-ātmanaḥ pratipādaka-dharmasya
T11dhkhetuu:919: 03115 na api sandigdha-lakṣaṇo hetur bhavati iti na kaścid hetur
T11dhkhetuu:920: 03116 bhavet. tulya-lakṣaṇe hi dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyogi-sambhavo adṛṣṭa-
T11dhkhetuu:925: 03119 sva-sādhyaṃ niścāyayati ity atal-lakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt. tathā ca
T11dhkhetuu:927: 03121 hīyeta svalakṣaṇa-yuktayor hetvor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena upanipāte
T11dhkhetuu:928: 03122 viruddhāvyabhicārī iti. na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:931: 03124 utpaśyāmaḥ. tasmān na asty eva viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā
T11dhkhetuu:933: dṛṣṭa-pratihetor api hetoḥ prāg itareṇa na kaścid
T11dhkhetuu:934: 03202 viśeṣo lakṣyate. na ca sambhavat-pratihetūnām api sarvadā
T11dhkhetuu:936: atiśayavatī tu prajñā-utprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā. tena aniścayaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:944: 03208 hetuṃ kṛtakatva-ādi kaścin na darśayed iti. idam aprakāśyam
T11dhkhetuu:945: 03209 apy asaṃvaraṇīyam api iti kaṣṭhataraṃ vyasanam āyātaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:946: 03210 kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta. sa tāvad ayaṃ hetur vastūni
T11dhkhetuu:950: 03214 vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣān tadbhāva-sampadaḥ pracyāvya-
T11dhkhetuu:951: 03215 bhraṣṭa-rājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati iti kiṃ atra brūmaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:952: 03216 puruṣa-pratibhākṛtaṃ ca sādhanatvam. tat kiṃ vastutaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:953: 03217 sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā. sa ca hetuḥ svabhāvatas tad-dharma-bhāvī
T11dhkhetuu:957: 03220 ca katham anyadā api sādhanaṃ kasyacit.
T11dhkhetuu:963: 03303 bhaviṣyati. kiṃ-rūpāl liṅgād artho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipattur
T11dhkhetuu:967: 03306 pratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate. tathā yad asya ātma-rūpaṃ tal
T11dhkhetuu:968: 03307 lakṣaṇam, na tu pararūpam. pratipatti-janmany upayoga-mātrāt
T11dhkhetuu:971: na hi teṣv asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati.
T11dhkhetuu:972: 03310 niścita-grahaṇaṃ tarhi na kartavyam. na na kartavyam,
T11dhkhetuu:974: 03312 hetum icchatāṃ na eva samartho hetur bhavati, sator api
T11dhkhetuu:976: 03314 gamaka iti jñāpana-arthaṃ niścita-grahaṇam. tena pararūpaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:987: 03320 sattā-vyavasthāyās tayor eva sattā-prasiddher iti sarvatra
T11dhkhetuu:988: 03401 sattā-vyavasthā eva tat-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākarṣati. parārthatvāc
T11dhkhetuu:990: 03403 arthasya iti tad rūpaṃ ye na vidanti,
T11dhkhetuu:997: 03407 anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sattāyāṃ saṃśayāt. tasmād yataḥ sattā-
T11dhkhetuu:998: 03408 prasādhaka-pramāṇād anayor niścayas tad-adhīnā iti jñāpana-artham
T11dhkhetuu:1001: 03411 pṛthag ato jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
T11dhkhetuu:1006: 03414 iti cet, na, hetoḥ sapakṣa-asapakṣayor bhāva-abhāvayor aparaspara-
T11dhkhetuu:1007: 03415 ākṣepāt; ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayati ity ucyate,
T11dhkhetuu:1008: 03416 na eko artho dvitīyasya. nanu tatra eva bhāvo tad-abhāve
T11dhkhetuu:1009: 03417 ca abhāva iti vākye paraspara-ākṣepa iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:1012: 03419 ubhayam ākṣipati na punaḥ kevalau bhāva-abhāvāv ākṣipataḥ;
T11dhkhetuu:1015: 03421 tasmāt tatra eva bhāva iti na bhāva eva ucyate,
T11dhkhetuu:1017: 03501 eva, yena bhāvo abhāvo vā dvitīyam ākṣipet. na evaṃ jñānaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:1018: 03502 para-upalakṣaṇāt trailakṣaṇyād vyatirekitam iti na lakṣaṇa-antaram.
